statements: UPDATE luxury_travel_agency SET agency_name = 'Luxury Travel World' WHERE agency_id = 1;
UPDATE luxury_travel_agency SET airline_relationships = '{"preferred_airline": "AirLux"}' WHERE agency_id = 3;

UPDATE luxury_travel_agency SET agency_name='Luxury Voyages', airline_relationships='{"airline":"Emirates","status":"preferred"}', hotel_relationships='{"hotel":"Four Seasons","status":"exclusive"}', tour_operator_relationships='{"tour_operator":"Trafalgar","status":"partner"}' WHERE agency_id=1;

UPDATE luxury_travel_agency SET tour_operator_relationships='{"tour_operator":"Gate 1 Travel","status":"preferred"}', hotel_relationships='{"hotel":"Ritz-Carlton","status":"exclusive"}', agency_name='Dream Destinations', airline_relationships='{"airline":"Qatar Airways","status":"partner"}' WHERE agency_id=2;
UPDATE airlines SET airfare = 500.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE hotels SET rating = 4.5, location = 'City Center' WHERE name = 'Hilton';
UPDATE airlines SET airfare = 500.00, name = 'Airline A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE hotels SET location = 'City Center', rating = 4.5 WHERE name = 'Hotel X';
UPDATE airlines SET fleet_size = 150 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE hotels SET rating = 4.5, location = 'Paris' WHERE name = 'Eiffel Tower Hotel';
UPDATE airlines SET headquarters = 'New Headquarters', fleet_size = 150 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE hotels SET rating = 4.5, location = 'New Location' WHERE name = 'Example Hotel';
UPDATE airlines SET type = 'International' WHERE airline_id = 1;
UPDATE hotels SET rating = 4, location = 'Beachside Resort' WHERE hotel_id = 3;
UPDATE airlines SET type = 'International' WHERE airline_id = 1;
UPDATE hotels SET rating = 4, location = 'Beachfront' WHERE hotel_id = 3;
UPDATE airlines SET airline_rating = 4.5 WHERE airline_id = 1;
UPDATE packages SET package_price = 1500.00, package_description = 'Luxury vacation package' WHERE package_id = 3;
UPDATE airlines SET airline_name = 'New Airline Name', airline_rating = 4.8 WHERE airline_id = 1
UPDATE hotels SET hotel_rating = 4.5, hotel_name = 'Updated Hotel Name' WHERE hotel_id = 2
